subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Hawaii’s football team will hit the road and travel to the mainland for a 12-day, 8,600 mile excursion to play Louisiana Tech and U.N.L.V.
snippet: Hawaii’s football team will hit the road and travel to the mainland for a 12-day, 8,600 mile excursion to play Louisiana Tech and U.N.L.V.
